docs.snippet: Oil company BP and the maker of Budweiser beer on Monday joined the ranks of World Cup sponsors pressing football's rulers to tackle corruption allegations over the awarding of the 2022 tournament to Qatar....
docs.lead_paragraph: Oil company BP and the maker of Budweiser beer on Monday joined the ranks of World Cup sponsors pressing football's rulers to tackle corruption allegations over the awarding of the 2022 tournament to Qatar.

headline.main: BP, Budweiser Join Football Sponsors' Revolt Over Qatar
headline.print_headline: BP, Budweiser Join Football Sponsors' Revolt Over Qatar

docs.snippet: The Confederation of African Football has raised the prospect of taking legal action for defamation following allegations in the British press that FIFA vice president and African football head Issa Hayatou received favors for backing Qatar to hos...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Confederation of African Football has raised the prospect of taking legal action for defamation following allegations in the British press that FIFA vice president and African football head Issa Hayatou received favors for backing Qatar to host the 2022 World Cup.

headline.main: CAF Considers Legal Action Over Corruption Claims
headline.print_headline: CAF Considers Legal Action Over Corruption Claims

docs.snippet: Africa's soccer chiefs launched an attack on the media - "notably British" - for what it called "repeated, deliberately hateful, defamatory and degrading attacks" on the integrity of the Confederation of African Football (CAF) "and the entire Afri...
docs.lead_paragraph: Africa's soccer chiefs launched an attack on the media - "notably British" - for what it called "repeated, deliberately hateful, defamatory and degrading attacks" on the integrity of the Confederation of African Football (CAF) "and the entire African continent".

headline.main: Africa Supports FIFA Boss Blatter, Hits Out at 'Degrading' Media
